ygData.subject: Re: I will no longer post updates to this list.  (txt)
ygData.msgSnippet: Charles, If you won t post your updates here anymore please post them to EQ_smiths@onelist.com  It is another blacksmith list for EQ.  Maybe they would
ygData.messageBody:
Charles,
If you won't post your updates here anymore please post them to
EQ_smiths@onelist.com It is another blacksmith list for EQ. Maybe they
would actually appreciate the info on blacksmithing considering that's what
the mailing list is about. If people piss and moan there too just post the
link to you blacksmith section. Most people will check out the sight when
they see how well it is put together. Keep the updates coming.

Arden
Cazic-Thule
